name: like-i-said-memory-v2
description: Persistent memory and task management for AI assistants with auto-linking capabilities
long_description:
Like-I-Said MCP Server v2 provides comprehensive memory and task management for AI assistants. Features include:

• **Persistent Memory**: Store conversations and information across sessions
• **Task Management**: Create and track tasks with automatic memory linking
• **Smart Organization**: Project-based organization with categories and tags
• **Powerful Search**: Full-text search across all memories and tasks
• **Session Handoffs**: Generate context documents for seamless transitions

All data is stored locally on your machine using markdown files with YAML frontmatter, ensuring complete privacy and control over your AI assistant's memory.
